word: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

word: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

oldWord: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
word: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey
